video_title: Get Out of Your Comfort Zone #shorts
transcript:
- Did you know the longer you stay
within your comfort zone
the less happy you'll be?
Instead, it's slowly killing you?
We as humans, we tend to
stay within our comfort zone
because we are scared of fear,
feeling anxious and feeling stress.
But little do you know that in life,
it's either growing or you're dying.
And the key is to keep moving forward.
If there's no growth,
then there's no progress.
And if there's no progress,
you'll never be able to
see you are on the outside.
So do your best to be
outside of the comfort zone.
Take baby steps to
build up your confidence
and make your goals and dreams come true
and don't let anything hold you back.
